interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/12/18 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Français (Canada)', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Français (France)'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica) [CC]', 'Español (España) [CC]', 'Suomi', 'Français [CC]', 'Italiano [CC]', 'Nederlands [CC]', 'Nynorsk', 'Polski', 'Português [SDH]', 'Svenska'], 'Directors': ['Jon Turteltaub'], 'Producers': ['Belle Avery', 'Colin Wilson', 'Lorenzo di Bonaventura'], 'Starring': ['Jason Statham', 'Bingbing Li', 'Rainn Wilson'], 'Studio': ['WARNER HOME VIDEO']} Review Text: Worth watching . I have no idea why some reviewers said this movie was to predictable? I could not guess who was ever gonna die or live. Everytime i was sure someone was surely dead , nope! I was wrong .
All in all it was good movie . Review Title: Good shark movie Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

actual_interaction.title: Good shark movie
actual_interaction.text:
Worth watching . I have no idea why some reviewers said this movie was to predictable? I could not guess who was ever gonna die or live. Everytime i was sure someone was surely dead , nope! I was wrong .
All in all it was good movie .
